description:
Your single entry point to all remote development environments


The Gateway 2024.3 is out with the following updates:
- You can now download and upload files between your local file system and a remote backend.
- The migration and synchronization of settings have been improved.
- The port forwarding feature now works as expected.
- The GPG signing method is now supported in remote development mode.
- The connection to JetBrains remote development features is now more stable.
- Scrolling for long lists now works properly.
For more details, please refer to the release notes.
